content: it s pumpkin spice season and nothing quite represents the pumpkin craze like pumpkin spice lattes these signature fall drinks are one of the early signs that fall is on its way again i know not everyone cares for the taste but even if you re not a pumpkin spice fall-natic like me you can appreciate the cuteness and relevance of this sweet little amigurumi pumpkin spice latte as if his tall whipped cream hat wasn t enough to send you into cuteness overload his cup cozy even doubles as a comfy fall scarf with a pumpkin applique on it it doesn t get much cuter than this the pattern uses the chain single_crochet single_crochet decrease and slip_stitch it would also be helpful to know how to crochet in the round a full/detailed list of abbreviations and supplies can be found in the pattern the difficulty for this pattern is easy exact gauge is not essential to this project finished size is about 7 5 inches tall
